channel.title: Drupal on Section
channel.description: Recent content in Drupal on Section

item.title: Set up Drupal 8 on Section
item.description: The following is a guide to installing the Section Drupal module into an existing Drupal 8 application. This module allows Section’s global, distributed caching layer to quickly respond to invalidation events from a Drupal instance in exactly the same way that Drupal’s internal cache or a local varnish cache running on the host machine does, ensuring that the content in Section’s global caching layer is never stale. Prerequisites An existing Section application.
